players.name: Kate Morrison
players.arc: From paralyzed by fear to taking action

perspectives.name: Fear vs Courage
perspectives.description: The journey from paralysis to action
perspectives.thematic_question: Can you be brave when you're terrified?

storybeats.title: Ordinary World
storybeats.description: Kate boards the late train home, exhausted after therapy. Everything seems normal. People read, sleep, scroll their phones.

storybeats.title: First Sign
storybeats.description: Kate notices a passenger watching her. Her PTSD triggers. Heart racing. Palms sweating. Is it real or her paranoia?

storybeats.title: Locked In
storybeats.description: The train passes its stop. Doesn't slow. Kate sees the conductor slumped. This is happening again.

storybeats.title: Panic Spreads
storybeats.description: Passengers realize they're trapped. Chaos erupts. Kate freezes, flashbacks overwhelming her.

storybeats.title: The Demand
storybeats.description: Hijackers reveal themselves. They want Kate. She was the negotiator who 'killed' their leader five years ago. Revenge.

storybeats.title: Impossible Choice
storybeats.description: Kate can surrender and they kill her, or fight back and risk everyone. She's drowning in fear.

storybeats.title: Small Victory
storybeats.description: Kate uses her training. Talks a hijacker into hesitating for just ten seconds. Enough to save one passenger.

storybeats.title: Darkest Hour
storybeats.description: Hijacker executes a hostage in retaliation. Kate breaks. She failed again. She'll always fail.

storybeats.title: The Shift
storybeats.description: Another passenger whispers: 'You saved my daughter. Whatever happens, you saved her.' Kate realizes she can act despite fear.

storybeats.title: The Plan
storybeats.description: Kate forms a plan. Hands still shaking, voice still breaking, but moving forward anyway. This is courage.

storybeats.title: The Confrontation
storybeats.description: Kate faces the leader. Terrified but unmoving. Uses everything she learned from failing. High-stakes negotiation at 90mph.

storybeats.title: Resolution
storybeats.description: Train stops. Hostages safe. Kate steps onto the platform. She's still afraid. She'll always be afraid. But fear doesn't own her anymore.
